definitions.title: adj.gent.
definitions.body: of foregoing ;—´[[ח]] Ju Jdg 3:3, Ez Eze 32:30; elsewhere pl. [[חִידׂנִים]] De 3:9 +, [[חִידוֹנִים]] Ju Jdg 10:12 [[חִדׂנִים]] Jdg 18:7; +3 t.; fpl. [[חֵדְנִיּׁת]] 1Ki 11:1; —as subst. = Sidonians, coll c. art. Ez Eze 32:30, Ju Jdg 3:3; in earlier lit. appar. = Phoenicians De 3:9, Jos 13:4, Jos 13:6; Ju Jdg 3:3, Jdg 10:12, Jdg 18:7, Jdg 18:7, 1Ki 5:20 (=Tyre v:1Ki 5:15), 1Ki 16:31 (if, [Jos:Ant. viii. 13, 1] Ethb. was king of Tyre also), Ez Eze 32:30; also ´[[עַשְׁתּׂרֶת אְֶהֵֽי ח]] 1Ki 11:5, 1Ki 11:33, cf. 2Ki 23:13; named with Tyrians 1Ch 22:4, Ezr 3:7.
